message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm aiming a bit higher.  Would you consider $1,100,000?

I understand you're trying to reach a middle ground, but I'm still a bit off on the price. Would you consider $950,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
